original_text: A wife who is always arguing with you is as bad as rain that never stops falling. A wife who is always arguing with you
korean_text: 다투는 여자는 비 오는 날에 이어 떨어지는 물방울이라

sentences.original_text: A wife who is always arguing with you
is as bad as rain that never stops falling
A wife who is always arguing with you
